mapper.insert: insert into base (base_id, base_name, base_type, found_type_id, dept_id, user_id, found_src, found_budget, found_proj, found_dept, found_stat, base_stat, remark) values (#{baseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{baseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foundTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foundSrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foundBudget,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foundProj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foundDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foundStat,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{baseStat,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update base set base_name = #{baseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, base_type = #{baseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, found_type_id = #{foundTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, found_src = #{foundSrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, found_budget = #{foundBudget,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, found_proj = #{foundProj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, found_dept = #{foundDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, found_stat = #{foundStat,jdbcType=CHAR}, base_stat = #{baseStat,jdbcType=CHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where base_id = #{baseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select base_id, base_name, base_type, found_type_id, dept_id, user_id, found_src, found_budget, found_proj, found_dept, found_stat, base_stat, remark from base where base_id = #{baseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
